Properties Dialog: Assignment

Fault Memory Window » Properties » Assignment

 

On this page you can assign several requests to the functionality:

  • Read environmental data
  • Delete single DTC
  • Delete all DTCs

The requests have been defined on the page Messages.

The respective requests are sent by the Fault Memory Window when the functions Delete single DTC or Delete all DTCs are called.

Note

The functionality Read environmental date is automatically called every time the Fault Memory Window is updated. So it cannot be called manually.

Single requests for the functionality

  • Read all identified
  • Read all supported

can be called from the selection field of the Fault Memory Window that's why they are not inserted here.

Keyboard
